naslov: ČIOVO - TROGIR Four modern Villas - Exclusively (prodaja)
opis: Četiri moderne i luksuzne vile u nizu, novogradnja, smještene u Okrugu Gornjem na otoku Čiovu, protežu se na tri etaže i ukupno 1.130 kvadratnih metara bruto stambene površine, svaka s predivnim pogledom na more. Prizemlje se sastoji od ulaznog hodnika, prostranog dnevnog boravka, kuhinje i blagovaonice u otvorenom konceptu, kupaonice te stubišta. Vanjski dio nudi udobnu terasu s privatnim bazenom. Na prvom katu nalaze se tri spavaće sobe, dvije kupaonice, hodnik i stubište, dok je drugi kat rezerviran za prostranu krovnu terasu s panoramskim pogledom na more, ljetnu kuhinju i toalet. Vile su građene od vrhunskih materijala, uključujući kvalitetnu stolariju, pločice, parkete i kupaonsku opremu. Prozori s trostrukim staklenim oknima, podno grijanje na cijelom prizemlju i u kupaonicama na katu (s mogućnošću individualne regulacije po prostoriji), klima uređaji u svakoj prostoriji, moderni alarmni sustav, video nadzor, video portafon, luksuzna rasvjeta te smart-home sustav osiguravaju vrhunsku udobnost. Vile su u potpunosti opremljene i namještene. Nalaze se na blago uzdignutoj lokaciji s fantastičnim pogledom, a ujedno su u neposrednoj blizini mora i imaju jednostavan pristup plaži. *Svaka vila ima osigurano parkirno mjesto, odličnu prometnu povezanost te svu potrebnu infrastrukturu i sadržaje u okolici. Vlasništvo je uredno, sve dozvole su ishođene, a vile su spremne za useljenje. --- Four modern and luxurious row villas, newly built in Okrug Gornji on the island of Čiovo, span three floors with a total of 1,130 square meters of gross living space, each offering a stunning sea view. The ground floor features an entrance hall, a spacious living room, kitchen, and dining area in an open-plan layout, a bathroom, and a staircase. Outside, there’s a cozy terrace with a private pool. The first floor consists of three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a hallway, and a staircase. The second floor is dedicated to a large rooftop terrace with a panoramic sea view, a summer kitchen, and a toilet. Each villa is constructed using premium materials, including high-quality carpentry, tiles, parquet flooring, and bathroom fittings. The windows feature triple glazing, and there’s underfloor heating throughout the ground floor and in the upstairs bathrooms (with individual room controls), air conditioning units in every room, a modern alarm system, video surveillance, video intercom, luxurious lighting, and a smart-home system. The villas come fully furnished. Located on a slightly elevated position with breathtaking views, they are also just a short distance from the sea with direct beach access. Each villa has a secure parking space, excellent road connections, and all the necessary infrastructure and amenities nearby. The ownership papers are in order, all permits are obtained, and the villas are ready for immediate occupancy. Vlasništvo uredno 1/1.
